hotels.title: Idyllic UK Family-Friendly Escape along Cornish Coast with Complimentary Kids Club Sessions
hotels.description: Experience the elegant charms of a quintessential Victorian mansion at Fowey Hall , a family-friendly retreat on the picturesque Cornish coast. Overlooking the stunning Fowey estuary, the historic manor house is a joyful abode, with facilities to capture the imaginations of both big and little travellers. Parents can savour the taste of Cornwall with locally sourced dishes at the hotel's onsite restaurant, go for a refreshing swim in the pool or pamper with a massage at the luxury spa, all while the little ones are entertained at the Four Bears Den kids' club. If you wish to explore, the iconic Eden Project and the Lost Gardens of Heligan are moments away.
